scripts.start: concurrently "docker-compose up" "npm run dev-server" "npm run dev-client"
scripts.migration-script: cd db && python feedbuzz_migration/manage.py script "$NAME" feedbuzz_migration
scripts.migration-test: cd db && python feedbuzz_migration/manage.py test postgresql://postgres:feedbuzz@localhost:5430/feedbuzz feedbuzz_migration
scripts.migration-upgrade: cd db && python feedbuzz_migration/manage.py upgrade postgresql://postgres:feedbuzz@localhost:5430/feedbuzz feedbuzz_migration
scripts.version-control-db: cd db && python feedbuzz_migration/manage.py version_control postgresql://postgres:feedbuzz@localhost:5430/feedbuzz feedbuzz_migration
